content: I can provide you accurate information about the performance of the toronto raptors in the playoffs of the 2019-2020 nba season. the toronto raptors had a high-level performance in the playoffs during the 2019-2020 season. they swept the brooklyn nets in the first round, beat the boston celtics in seven games in the second round, and then beat the miami heat in six games in the eastern conference finals. in the nba finals, they faced off against the western conference champions, the los angeles lakers, and lost in six games. despite not winning the championship, their performance in the playoffs was excellent.
